summary: This document appears to be a public notice or cover page from the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, providing contact information for potential victims or witnesses to call the FBI. It references the indictment and case number 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, referenced in the indictment and for whom potential victims are sought.

keyFacts: The document is from the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, case number 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).
It provides a public notice encouraging individuals who believe they were victims of Jeffrey Epstein or have information about the allegations in the indictment to contact the FBI at 1-800-Call-FBI.
The document references an indictment against Jeffrey Epstein, indicating formal criminal charges were filed.
The file identifier is EFTA00016744.pdf from Data Set 8.
